definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
erhua variant of 酒令[jiu3 ling4]

sentences.english: Thanks for Prohibition and the war against drugs.
sentences.chinese: 感谢禁酒令和与毒品之战。

sentences.english: The results from repeal were both immediate and amazing.
sentences.chinese: 撤销禁酒令的结果是最立竿见影和最传奇的。

sentences.english: Crime and corruption sank, with the murder rate falling to its pre-Prohibition level in a manner of a few years.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪与腐败率在几年内就降到了禁酒令实行前的水平。

sentences.english: After Prohibition, laws made production feasible for only a few huge distilleries.
sentences.chinese: 禁酒令之后，法律只允许一些大酒厂制酒。

sentences.english: Drinking games were popular over the Tang Dynasty feast tables.
sentences.chinese: 酒令是唐代酒筵间十分常见的一种有规则的游戏活动。

sentences.english: No Hang Jiuling tools of Drinkers' wager game, when drinking with friends.
sentences.chinese: 朋友一起喝酒时，没有行酒令的工具。

sentences.english: Drinkers' wager game is a kind of add to the fun games on the banquet.
sentences.chinese: 酒令，是酒席上的一种助兴游戏。

definition: to issue orders/to order sb to drink in a drinking game
drinking game where one has to guess the number of small objects in the other player's closed hand
chip on which tallies are recording during a drinking game
to urge sb to drink alcohol
ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment
